articles.title: WHO 'Strongly Advises Against' Use of 2 Antibody COVID Treatments - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Mounting evidence from lab tests suggests therapies, sotrovimab and casirivimab-imdevimab, have limited clinical activity against latest iterations of virus
articles.content:
London  Two COVID-19 antibody therapies are no longer recommended by the World Health Organization because omicron and the variant's latest offshoots have likely rendered them obsolete.

articles.title: Discovery of extinct prehistoric reptile that lived among dinosaurs - Science Daily
articles.description: Researchers have discovered a new extinct species of lizard-like reptile that belongs to the same ancient lineage as New Zealand's living tuatara. A team of scientists describe the new species Opisthiamimus gregori, which once inhabited Jurassic North America…
